item.title: The Challenges of the Nonlinear Regime for Physics-Informed Neural Networks
item.description: Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) training dynamics for nonlinear PDEs are fundamentally different than linear ones; this paper reveals why using second-order methods is crucial for solving non…
